page.title: 04WETHERBY COUNCIL 2 services
page.content: The{Social Services}Department takes care of the elderly, mentally and physically handicapped people and the deprived children in the area. The {Housing}Department is responsible for council house allocation and repairs. It also gathers the rents and rates due to the council. The{Environmental {Health}Department deals with complaints from the public:- noise, dogs fouling footpaths, rats and mice. It is also responsible for the inspection of food and hygiene standards in shops, as well as housing improvement grants. The Department for {Planning and Building Control}deals with building regulations on new developments and alterations to existing buildings. The{Education Department deals with evening classes school meals, transport, attendence and school lettings to the community.
